code: import React from'react';import{InputLabel,Select,MenuItem,FormControl}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SchoolYearSelect=_ref=>{let{value,onChange}=_ref;const currentYear=new Date().getFullYear();const generateSchoolYearOptions=()=>{const years=[];for(let i=-10;i<=0;i++){const startYear=currentYear+i;const endYear=startYear+1;years.push("".concat(startYear,"-").concat(endYear));}return years;};const schoolYearOptions=generateSchoolYearOptions();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormControl,{variant:"outlined",fullWidth:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputLabel,{htmlFor:"school-year-select",children:"\u5B66\u5E74"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{id:"school-year-select",value:value,onChange:onChange,label:"\u5B66\u5E74",children:schoolYearOptions.map(year=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{value:year,children:year},year))})]});};export default SchoolYearSelect;
